name: Fingers vs Knife
description:
Fingers Vs Knife is a zombie game that requires great concentration. Play by moving a knife across his hand.
Knife moves faster and faster making the game more difficult in time... How long can you hold it away?
Save the zombie !

Play with the female zombie hand and the other object as ice pick, screwdriver, tweezers and more.

Get beat all in the Game Center leaderboard !
